name: Electro-loop-tion
description:
In the future hair is cool, goggles are rad, and monsters attack.

Will you use the power of electro-loop-tion to stop the hordes and save the future?

Yes. You will.

---

Instructions:

  • Click and drag the character to move
  • Click the yellow button, and then your character, to drop a lightning pylon
  • Click the clock button, and then a lightning pylon, to return to that pylon

Lines of lightning pylons are joined by electricity. Monsters struck by the electricity become stuck. Create a loop of lightning to all enemies inside.

Clear all enemies to win!
